Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are taking to social media to share their thoughts ahead of the upcoming budget night in Australia. While some are expressing gratitude for extended safety nets for single parents others are calling out politicians for lying to the public and blocking efforts to address debt accumulation. A cost-of-living package aimed to support vulnerable Australians is highly anticipated while some warn that people may be set up for disappointment on the night. Nevertheless some look forward to the budget expecting a responsible and forward-thinking approach to economic management.
